post.image_prompt: The image is a close-up shot of a woman with medium skin tone, likely of Middle Eastern descent, showcasing a radiant and natural makeup look. The overall mood is elegant, sophisticated, and reflective, aligning with the spiritual significance of Eid. The image aims to capture the essence of inner and outer beauty, reflecting the light and joy of the Eid celebration.
